meanings.sent1: I love eating figo with my breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent2: The figo tree in our backyard produces delicious fruits every summer.
meanings.sent3: The figo looked so ripe and juicy that I couldn't resist taking a bite.
meanings.sent4: The figo hanging from the tree was a tempting treat for the birds.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of figo filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A Portuguese slang term for something cool or awesome
meanings.sent1: That new video game is so figo, everyone wants to play it.
meanings.sent2: The concert last night was absolutely figo, the music was fantastic.
meanings.sent3: Wearing sunglasses indoors may not be cool, but it sure is figo.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were so figo, it was like watching a professional.
meanings.sent5: The superhero movie was beyond figo, it had everyone on the edge of their seats.
